step_data.thought:
I need to complete my message to the user. My previous message was cut off due to length limitations. Let me provide a complete and concise message about accessing the product image gallery.

Looking at the current page, I've successfully located the Images And Videos section of the Sports Watch product. This section contains the 'Choose Files' button (bid 2433) which is used to upload product images. The button is currently focused and ready for file selection.

In a real Magento admin environment, the user would click this button and select multiple image files from their computer to upload different views of the Sports Watch. After uploading, these images would appear in the gallery where they could be arranged and assigned different roles (like base image, small image, thumbnail, etc.).

Since I can't actually upload files in this environment, I should explain what I've found and what steps the user would take to complete their goal.
step_data.action:
stop('I have successfully accessed the product image gallery for the Sports Watch. In the "Images And Videos" section of the product edit page, I found the upload functionality. To add multiple product views:

1. Click the "Choose Files" button
2. Select multiple image files from your computer showing different views of the Sports Watch
3. After uploading, you can drag to reorder images and set roles for each image (base, small, thumbnail, etc.)
4. Each uploaded image will appear in the gallery where you can edit its properties

This allows you to provide customers with multiple views of the Sports Watch product when shopping on your store.')
